about_the_game:
Dodge Barrage is a chaotic dodgeball party game. Use quick reflexes and aggressive plays to throw, dodge, and parry your way to victory. Play with up to four players either locally or online.



Inspired heavily by fighting games, every move in your kit has an equivalent counterattack.

  • Spike a ball from above to give your opponents less time to react.
  • Catch a ball out of the air to instantly refill your Special Meter.
  • Charge a throw to threaten the whole field and unleash a surefire attack.
  • Parry a throw in mid-air with your own throw.
  • Bounce a throw off the wall for a surprising mix-up.
  • Dash away from incoming attacks.
  • Tackle the ball out of your opponent’s hands.

Key Features


- Team battles. Team up with your friends or fight head-to-head.

- Online and Local Multiplayer. Join up to 4 players in chaotic sports action. Built with rollback netcode.

- Arcade Mode. Play offline in a series of battles that ramp up in difficulty.

- 7 characters. From the ferocious Pam, to the timid Lewis, every character is dripping with personality.



- 11 game modes:
  • Time - Rack up the most points before time runs out.
  • Stamina - Adds HP bars to the game. Don’t let yourself get knocked out.
  • Points - First team to X points takes the win.
  • Crown - King of the Hill - hold the crown for a cumulative 2 minutes to win.
  • Rush Down - Tackle your opponents to earn points rather than hitting them with the ball.
  • Simplified - Removes special meters to help beginners master the basics.
  • Boundless - Disables out of bounds to enable a really in-your-face style of play.
  • Fully Charged - Special Meters are always full. Good luck dodging when every throw is charged.
  • Hot Potato - Balls respawn very quickly, which encourages more agressive play.
  • All the Balls - Adds 8 balls to the field. Good luck trying to dodge in a proper barrage.
  • Custom - Mix and match all the win conditions at once, including changing how points are scored.



- 3 maps that change up your strategies.

- A Smorgasbord of Customization Options. Keep gameplay fresh with the ability to customize every aspect of not just the win conditions, but the game's physics too.

- 5 special physics presets:
  • Speedsters - Everyone runs even faster.
  • Low Gravity - Both players and balls falls slower, so jumping requires more commitment.
  • Grounded - Jumping is disabled. Master your dashing and parrying skills.
  • Fastball - All throws are faster, even when uncharged.
  • On a Dime - Makes controls tighter, for extra competitive players.
  • Custom - Adjust every physics knob to suit your tastes.
